mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cafe_member( member_no , cafe_no , user_no , cafe_member_grade_no , notice_flag, member_nickname, member_status_code , favorite_flag, reg_date, visit_count ) VALUES ( seq_member_no.NEXTVAL , #{cafeNo} , #{userNo} , #{cafeMemberGradeNo} , '0' , #{memberNickname} , 'cs101', '0', SYSDATE,'0')
mapper.sql:
SELECT m.cafe_no, m.member_no, m.member_nickname, g.member_grade_code, g.grade_name, m.reg_date, m.visit_count,m.member_status_code FROM cafe_member m, cafe_member_grade g WHERE m.cafe_member_grade_no=g.cafe_member_grade_no AND m.cafe_no = #{cafeNo}
AND g.member_grade_code= 'cg100'
AND g.member_grade_code= 'cg101'
AND g.member_grade_code= 'cg102'
AND g.member_grade_code= 'cg103'
AND g.member_grade_code= 'cg104'
AND g.member_grade_code= 'cg105'
AND g.member_grade_code= 'cg106'
mapper.select: SELECT m.cafe_no, m.member_no, m.member_nickname, g.member_grade_code, g.grade_name, m.reg_date, m.visit_count,m.member_status_code FROM cafe_member m, cafe_member_grade g WHERE m.cafe_member_grade_no=g.cafe_member_grade_no AND m.member_no = #{memberNo}
